title: Energy of SHM - blocks of different mass

content.question: Block <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> and Block <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="2 m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></math> are attached to identical horizontal springs. Both blocks are displaced the same distance from equilibrium and released from rest, undergoing simple harmonic motion. Block <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> has maximum kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub 1 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math> and maximum speed <math alttext="v sub 1 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>, and Block <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has maximum kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math> and maximum speed <math alttext="v sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the maximum kinetic energies and maximum speeds of Block <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Block <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub 1 comma max, equals K sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>; <math alttext="v sub 1 comma max, equals v sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub 1 comma max, equals K sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>; <math alttext="v sub 1 comma max, is greater than v sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub 1 comma max, is less than K sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>; <math alttext="v sub 1 comma max, equals v sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub 1 comma max, is less than K sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>; <math alttext="v sub 1 comma max, is greater than v sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="K sub 1 comma max, equals K sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>; <math alttext="v sub 1 comma max, is greater than v sub 2 comma max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
